body_html:
@vrv Perhaps. @yaroslavvb, with TF 1.0, that symbol does seem to be present in pywrap_tensorflow.so:

$ export so=`python -c "import tensorflow as tf; import os.path; print(os.path.dirname(tf.sysconfig.get_include())+'/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so')"`; nm -g $so | grep MinVLog
00000000023b9e70 T _ZN10tensorflow8internal10LogMessage12MinVLogLevelEv

@cancan101 This problem seems to be coming from mixing libc++ and libstdc++. Since you are on OSX, you most probably are compiling your my_op.so with libc++ and clang. One option is to try compiling with -stdlib=libstdc++.
